sentences.en: Alpine valleys resonant with the sound of church bells.
sentences.cn: 回荡着教堂钟声的阿尔卑斯山谷.

sentences.en: Every piece of glass has a natural resonant frequency—the speed at which it will vibrate if bumped or otherwise disturbed by some stimulus, such as a sound wave—as does every other material on Earth.
sentences.cn: 每片玻璃都有一个自然的共鸣频率——在此速度下，如果受到碰撞或者由某种刺激物打扰，它就会震动，如声波——地球上其他物质也是如此。

sentences.en: He had a deep, resonant voice, fitted to his massive frame.
sentences.cn: 他的嗓音低沉, 带着回音, 同他魁梧的体格非常相配.

sentences.en: He responded with a resonant laugh.
He talked very quickly , with a flow of easy words and in a deep , resonant voice.
sentences.cn: 他说得很快, 既流畅又浅显易懂.嗓音洪亮浑厚.

sentences.en: His voice sounded oddly resonant in the empty room.
sentences.cn: 他的声音在这空荡荡的房间里听起来异常嘹亮。

sentences.en: His voice was deep and resonant , with an air of authority.
sentences.cn: 他的嗓音浑厚低沉, 有一种格外威严的风采.

sentences.en: Montanelli's voice was rather low, but full and resonant.
sentences.cn: 蒙太尼里的声音很低, 却圆润、响亮.

sentences.en: Resonant frequencies are related to the shape and size dimensions of the element.
sentences.cn: 共振频率与这种元件的形状和大小有关.

sentences.en: Sounding her deep, resonant siren , the S . S . Jiangjin forges ahead.
sentences.cn: “ 江津 ”号昂奋而深沉的鸣响着汽笛向前方航进.

sentences.en: The amplified strings require less energy to produce a rich resonant sound.
sentences.cn: 声音被放大了,在琴弦上反需用很小的力量,就能产生丰满的、共鸣音响.
小提琴圆润悠扬的音色

sentences.en: The woods were resonant with the songs of birds.
This phenomenon is therefore known as'oil whip'or'resonant whirl '.
sentences.cn: 因此,这种现象称为 “ 油膜振荡 ” 或 “ 共振涡动. ”

words.tran_cn: [声] 共鸣器，共鸣体；共振器
产生共鸣；回响（resonate 的ing形式）
洪亮的，共振的；[语]共鸣的

phrases.tran_cn: 共振腔；空腔谐振器，呼吸腔
谐振槽；谐振回路；共鸣箱

trans.tran_cn: 洪亮的，回响的，共振的，能共鸣的
trans.tran_en: resonant materials increase any sound produced inside them
